resources.string: Add a task by pressing the plus button
Have you read the frequent asked questions? If you haven\'t, take a look at them here.

string-array.name: FAQQuestions
string-array.item: Where can I report an error?

string-array.name: FAQAnswers
string-array.item: Life Agenda is a simplified calendar application aimed to help you organize your life.

Google PlayStore automatically updates your applications by default, but if this is not your case, you can always check manually if there is any newer version. Any preferences or tasks will be saved upon update.
If you were to reinstall Life Agenda for whatever reason, bear in mind that your current tasks will be deleted.
This application is compatible only with devices with Android 4.1 Jelly Bean or higher.
Priority is a personalized number aimed to reflect the importance you give to each task, in order to help you on your organization.
Every day you will get notified if there are any overdue tasks. They will be automatically deleted after the fifth day in this condition.
Life Agenda\'s developers are open to hear about any errors or suggestions. You can send an E-mail to czop.developer@gmail.com
